name: Super Drill Out
description:
Game made for the Piauindie Game Jam 2021, in 72 hours.

The jam theme was: "The earth is the limit."

Based on that, we created an action game in which you control a Drill which has to defeat robotic serpents and collect powerups in order to try to reach the earth. Is the earth really the limit?

The game has a tutorial, check it out before playing!

We hope you enjoy playing our game. Any feedback is appreciated!
